title: Chenjiageng De Gushi
synopsis: "The Story of Tan Kah Kee" is currently my country's first film and television animation work based on the life deeds of patriotic overseas Chinese leader Tan Kah Kee. The drama has 13 episodes, each 14 minutes, with the three important nodes of "Nanyang Entrepreneurship", "Education", and "Politics" as the narrative clues, vividly telling the story of Mr. Tan Kah Kee's hard work, honest management, and growing up from a fishing village. For the overseas Chinese giants in Southeast Asia, he loves his hometown and serves the country, devotes his money to education, establishes Jimei School Village and Xiamen University, supports education, and actively participates in politics and saves the country. (translated from baidu baike)
